description:
With over 100 million monthly commercial active users, Office 365 is the largest productivity service available. Office 365 offers an incredible opportunity for developers, with business-critical data and millions of users combined with a platform designed to keep people in the flow of their work. As a developer, you can use the tools you work with every day to create intelligent, connected products and solutions.
The Global Office 365 Developer Bootcamp is a free, one-day training event led by Microsoft MVPs with the support of Microsoft. We will provide hands-on labs for latest and greatest technologies and products (Microsoft Graph, SharePoint Framework, Microsoft Teams, Office Add-ins, Connectors and Actionable Messages, and more) on the Office 365 platform. Developers can apply these learnings to their products or solutions to achieve more right away.

AGENDA
08h30 - 09h00 - Registration, coffee and networking09h00 - 09h45 - Keynote09h45 - 12h45 - Hands-On Lab: Teams & SPFx (optional: Authentication, Consent, GraphAPI)12h45 - 14h00 - Lunch14h00 - 17h00 - Hands-On Lab: Teams & Bots (optional: PowerApps, Flow)17h00 - Closing

SPEAKERS & ORGANIZERS
Beatriz Oliveira, Microsoft Office Development MVPJoão Sousa, Microsoft Developer Technologies MVPJosé António Silva, Microsoft Regional DirectorPedro Sousa, Microsoft Azure MVPSandro Pereira, Microsoft Azure MVPCarlos Silva, Platform Lead at BindTuningJoão Ferreira, SharePoint Lead at BindTuning
name: Global Office 365 Developer Bootcamp - Porto
